name: Cornpop
description: While my total playtime on Steam may look short, believe me when I say I've put in hundreds of hours into this ABSOLUTE BEAST of a game back in my early teenage years from 2010-2013 on my Xbox 360 and PS3, or as I like to call it 'The Golden Age of Gaming.'

name: WeezyLovesWeed
description: still one of the best shooters i have ever played especially sniping got me harddd

name: NightmareFoxCow
description: Multiplayer is infested with hackers: aimbots, wall hacks... I did not find a single match with no cheaters involved.

name: DarkestBlade
description: this is a brilliant game but there are WAAAY too many hackers to be able to enjoy it anymore

name: Mountain
description: It feels like snorting crack cocaine while Morgan freeman talks to you about the secrets of the universe while you are fighting mobs of Russians trying to steal hamburgers from your local Burgertown.

name: Halo
description: Iconic, not much else to say. I think the game wouldn't be nearly as good without the amazing score by Hans Zimmer, major highlight of the campaign.

name: Bonteski
description: Fun ADS-type shooter with great controls. Story is pretty decent and being able to do mp with bots is alot of fun.
